CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(Flag_Set__c),null,IF(Hours_Offset__c+Hours_Elapsed__c >= Case_Flags_Age_4_Hours__c, "L4", IF(Hours_Offset__c+Hours_Elapsed__c >= Case_Flags_Age_3_Hours__c, "L3", IF(Hours_Offset__c+Hours_Elapsed__c >= Case_Flags_Age_2_Hours__c, "L2", IF(Hours_Offset__c+Hours_Elapsed__c >= Case_Flags_Age_1_Hours__c, "L1", "L0") ))))
CustomField.label: Flag Level
